linux..cpp: cd @workSpace && ([[ ! -d exetFiles ]] & mkdir -p exetFiles) && cd @dir && g++ @fileName -o @workSpace/exetFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt && @workSpace/exetFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt
linux..java: cd @workSpace && ([[ ! -d exetClasses ]] & mkdir -p exetClasses) && cd @dir && javac -d @workSpace/exetClasses @fileName && java -classpath @workSpace/exetClasses @fileNameWithoutExt
linux..c: cd @workSpace && ([[ ! -d exetFiles ]] & mkdir -p exetFiles) && cd @dir && gcc @fileName -o @workSpace/exetFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt && @workSpace/exetFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt
linux..ts: cd @workSpace && ([[ ! -d exetEmittedJsFiles ]] & mkdir -p exetEmittedJsFiles) && cd @dir && tsc @fileName --outDir @workSpace/exetEmittedJsFiles && node @workSpace/exetEmittedJsFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt.js

darwin..cpp: cd @workSpace && ([[ ! -d exetFiles ]] & mkdir -p exetFiles) && cd @dir && g++ @fileName -o @workSpace/exetFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt && @workSpace/exetFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt
darwin..java: cd @workSpace && ([[ ! -d exetClasses ]] & mkdir -p exetClasses) && cd @dir && javac -d @workSpace/exetClasses @fileName && java -classpath @workSpace/exetClasses @fileNameWithoutExt
darwin..c: cd @workSpace && ([[ ! -d exetFiles ]] & mkdir -p exetFiles) && cd @dir && gcc @fileName -o @workSpace/exetFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt && @workSpace/exetFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt
darwin..ts: cd @workSpace && ([[ ! -d exetEmittedJsFiles ]] & mkdir -p exetEmittedJsFiles) && cd @dir && tsc @fileName --outDir @workSpace/exetEmittedJsFiles && node @workSpace/exetEmittedJsFiles/@fileNameWithoutExt.js

win32..cpp: cd @workSpace && (if not exist exetClasses mkdir exetClasses) & javac -d @workSpace\exetClasses @fileName && java -classpath @workSpace\exetClasses @fileNameWithoutExt
win32..java: cd @dir &&  (if not exist exetClasses mkdir exetClasses) & javac -d exetClasses @fileName && java -classpath exetClasses @fileNameWithoutExt
win32..c: cd @workspace && (if not exist exetFiles mkdir exetFiles) & cd @dir && gcc @fileName -o @workSpace\exetFiles\@fileNameWithoutExt && @workSpace\exetFiles\@fileNameWithoutExt
win32..ts: cd @workSpace && (if not exist exetEmittedJsFiles mkdir exetEmittedJsFiles) & cd @dir && tsc @fileName --outDir @workSpace\exetEmittedJsFiles && node @workSpace\exetEmittedJsFiles\@fileNameWithoutExt.js

exet.executorMap.description: This is the executor map which run appropriate execution commands for the corresponding extension name

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
